rules.justification: Upcoming BC 22 Error: A member of type {0} with name '{1}' is already defined in {2} '{3}' by the extension '{4}'. Duplicate member names are not allowed when defining CueActions.
Upcoming BC 23 Error: The name '{0}' does not exist in the current context.
Upcoming BC 23 Error: Access modifier '{0}' is not allowed for member '{1}' in the context of object type '{2}'.
Upcoming BC 23 Error: The property '{0}' is not valid for the cue action '{1}'.
Upcoming BC 23 Error: The property '{0}' is not valid for action '{1}' defined in a report request page.
Upcoming BC 24 Error: Enum values can't be nested. Use '{0}' instead.
Upcoming BC 24 Error: The name of a dataitem cannot be empty because it can cause runtime errors.

Upcoming BC 24 Error: The name of {0} '{1}' conflicts with {0} '{2}' defined in {3} '{4}' by the extension '{5}'. Please choose another name for one of them. Otherwise, this might cause runtime issues.
Upcoming BC 23 Error: Key vault URL is not a valid Azure key vault URL. A valid key vault URL must use HTTPS and point to the Azure key vault domain.
